lines.text: Group and ungroup markups
You can group two or more markups so that your comments function as a single comment.

spans.text: You can group two or more markups so that your comments function as a single comment.

lines.text: You might group markups temporarily to move them to a new location or to modify their

spans.text: You might group markups temporarily to move them to a new location or to modify their

Determines the opacity of comment pop-up notes in values from 1 to 100. When a pop-up

spans.text: Determines the opacity of comment pop-up notes in values from 1 to 100. When a pop-up

spans.text: note is open but not selected, an opacity value of 100 makes the note opaque, while lower

lines.text: values make it more transparent.
